alert.note: Alert for Dallas; Greene; Laclede (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued May 31 at 1:57PM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM CDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of southwest Missouri, including the following counties, Dallas, Greene, Laclede, Webster and Wright. * WHEN...Until 800 PM CDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Overflowing poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 157 PM CDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. Between 1 and 2 inches of rain have fallen. - This includes the following low water crossings... Wilson Creek at Farm Road 156, Osage Fork at Auburn Road, Cantrell Creek at Scott Creek Road, Myers Branch at Highway ZZ, Cabin Creek at Cabin Creek Road, Wilson Creek at Farm Road 146 and James River at Bell Ford Road. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Springfield, Marshfield, Battlefield, Strafford, Willard, Fair Grove, Niangua, Brookline, Northview, Bassville, Rader and Glidewell. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Many flood deaths occur in vehicles.
